entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Another segfault in gc_heap::get_region_plan_gen_num for a frozen object #63906
  • fgMorphArgs reorders (non-call) exception-throwing arguments #63905
    7.0.0
  • Cleanup Issue-URLs in Code #63902
  • public abstract partial class JsonConverter<T> should not hide TypeToConvert #63898
  • Mac OS (arm64) OS Monterey Build Issue #63895
  • internal sealed class EnumConverter<T>.Read() #63893
  • An alternative to ValueArray consideration #63891
  • Command object with MARS failing in Net 6 with common settings #63884
  • [API Proposal]: Allow specifying indent size and whitespace character when writing JSON with Utf8JsonWriter #63882
  • SSL connection could not be established on Darwin 20.6.0 with legacy HTTP handler #63873
  • Libraries like HttpClient use legacy activity creation, requiring hacks in OpenTelemetry SDK #63868
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Mark the return value of `ILogger.BeginScope` MaybeNull #63867
  • JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable is waiting for the entire stream before it starts deserializing #63864
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ValueTests.VeryLongInputString(length: 1073741791) #63861
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/TotalMemory2/TotalMemory2.sh #63860
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Regression\\GitHub_43569\\GitHub_43569\\GitHub_43569.cmd #63859
  • Test failure GC/Features/SustainedLowLatency/scenario/scenario.sh #63858
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\Allocation\\largeexceptiontest\\largeexceptiontest.cmd #63857
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\Arm\\ArmBase\\ArmBase_ro\\ArmBase_ro.cmd #63856
  • Test failure GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\plug\\plug.cmd #63854
  • NullabilityInfoContext returns incorrect result for parameter of private constructor in a public-only assembly #63853

Closed

  • System.Diagnostics: Activity.SetParent does not work if activity is already started #63883
  • AddEventLog settings silently disappear #51899
    Future
  • Allow narrow scope of correlation context collection in DiagnosticSource Activity #26465
    Future
  • macOS: Time Zone round-tripping through ToSerializedString/FromSerializedString is broken #63889
  • Wrong Path returned by DirectoryInfo.FullName #63892
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_34587/Runtime_34587/Runtime_34587.sh #63855
  • Windows x86 CoreCLR assert failure: ExecutionManager::IsManagedCode(GetControlPC(pCF->GetRegisterSet())) #60648
  • [Windows x86 Release] DllImportGenerator.Tests crashes the runtime in InvokeManagedCallbackAfterGCCollect #62728
  • CreateStringFromEncoding unnecessary calls Encoding.GetChars in release builds #63871
  • JsonElement.TryGetDateTime throws IndexOutOfRangeException #62720
    7.0.0
  • RuntimeInformation.OSArchitecture Property is incorrect on Apple M1 chip #63865
  • NativeAOT: Custom runtime without AppContext class throw #63862
  • File.SetLastWrite time fails on readonly files on Windows #62602
    6.0.x
  • NativeAOT: Application crash during exception stack building #63785

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net
  • Tune floating-point CSEs live across a call better #63903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add `UnicodeRange.ArabicExtendedB` #63901
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove mapfunc #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Replace "needs more info" label with "needs-author-action" #63899
    * NO MERGE *, area-Meta
  • Extend triage board automation to more pods #63897
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Initial WASI support prototype #63890
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63888
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Disable DllImportGenerator.Unit.Tests test suite on macOS+arm64+CoreCLR #63887
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] document marshalling internals #63885
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add managed implementation of Math/MathF.Abs #63881
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: don't make a syscall to check hidden on Linux. #63878
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [debugger][wasm] Added support for non user code attribute #63876
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-maui] [Android] Prevent potential out of bounds write on Android #63870
    area-System.Security
  • Remove commented code #63869
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Split CheckNotDisposed to allow inlining #63863
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix a few IndexOf{Any} uses #63852
    area-Meta

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63807
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Actually properly type primary selectors #63752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Separate variance information in mangled names #63866
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete UMThkCallFrame #63826
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Treat `CLS_VAR_ADDR` as never null #63844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix escaped strings for TryGetDateTime(Offset) #63534
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix generating RunTests.sh and RunTests.cmd scripts #63875
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • NativeAOT: Allow Delegate and MulticastDelegate marshalling #63219
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Prevent assert if stack trace has function pointer #63787
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert h2inc to a cmake function #63841
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove usage of FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #63850
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid additional local created for delegate invocations #63796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce number of jump-stubs on ARM64 via smaller preserved space #63842
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix compilation with older gcc #63721
    community-contribution
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement hash and HMAC stream one shots #63757
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Update SAN test to account for OpenSSL 3 changes #63655
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Encapsulate the logic of caching the last synchronously completed task. #61781
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx #63803
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • don't Flush readonly MemoryMappedViewAccessor on disposal #63794
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create to properly analyze types with nested generic types #63556
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • Add path information to INotifyInstanceUserLimitExceeded #62096
    area-System.IO
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63596
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [WIP]Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Remove CheckForOverflowUnderflow #63825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Avoid allocating byte array when setting ALPN list on Linux #63674
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Member resolving fix for derived attributes (#62937) #63837
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Allow SslStream in ConnectCallback #63851
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix issues with verify_regions, clear_batch_mark_array_bits. #63798
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix formatting of resource string where excess arguments are passed #63824
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Set zero (infinite) options timeout in case of Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan #63733
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • improve protocol detection in jail #63565
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-freebsd
  • Improve static field access for NativeAOT #63620
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ProcessLinkerXmlBase to NativeAOT #63666
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] GenericCompositionNode issue when Instantiation type name ends with _0, _1 or _2 #1821
  • WPF require MulticastDelegate #1107

Updated

  • Occasional SEHException in ObjWriter #1316

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Make boxing on reference types a noop #1823

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet restore with .net 6 SDK Build 101 Hangs for 5 minutes then exits with code 1. #23461

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0045 introduce unnecessary casts #58898
  • IDE0045 loose comment before `else` #58897
  • Region position bug for #if & #elif #58895
  • Quick Actions refactoring offers to introduce parameter for variable that is already a parameter #58893

PullRequests

Created

  • Formatter3 #58904
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix 'remove unnecessary paren' case where we weren't removing around a suppressed expression #58903
    Area-IDE
  • Fix case where we were not removing a removable cast. #58901
    Area-IDE
  • Introduce helper extensions to make it easier to check LangVersions. #58896
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58894
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Cherry-Pick 58869 #58892
    Area-IDE
  • Add Stack Trace Explorer to our searchable options #58869
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Formatting options refactoring - step 2 #58891
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Clone source from mirror for DartLab integration tests #58872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable CA2009: Do not call ToImmutableCollection on an ImmutableCollection value #53141
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow native integer operators in the corresponding underlying types #53417
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix ParseVBErrorOrWarning #47833
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Extend TypeDeclarationStructureTests with records #48161
    Area-IDE, Community
  • don't include implicit/explicit keywords when completing explicit interface operator #53938
    Area-IDE, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Report AdditionalLocations for CS8618 (uninitialized non-nullable member) #58096
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update API suggestion template #58098
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable CA1822 in Visual Studio layer #50569
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Community, Needs UX Triage
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • Restore feature to tell people when a lambda is unnecessary. #58875
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Support multi-caret when inserting doc comments #54741
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Authentication Error with Latest Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authetication.JwtBearer(6.0.1) #39586
  • Support setting HTTP response headers using some Results methods for Minimal APIs #39585
  • Cannot debug Blazor WASM demo app - issues with extensions #39584
  • Blazor support for webtransport #39583
  • Blazor component errors are not informative #39580
  • aspnetcore reporting tool #39579
  • Use server garbage collection in the Worker Service project template #39578
  • submit form js/c# from outside without having submit button #39574
    Backlog
  • How does SignalR work with Blazor Server when everything is rendered server-side? #39573
  • "dotnet watch" Hot Reload doesn't work if passing arguments #39572
  • Blazor connects to Vue/react/angular #39562

Closed

  • Failed to find runtime module (coreclr.dll or clr.dll or libcoreclr.so), 0x80004002 #39564
  • IIS -> Lock .NET Core application DLL file #3793
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: json #39559
  • Blazor Application 404 error after command line execution #39550
  • Create BlazorWebAssemblyApp 5.0/3.1 project in M1 machine and use the command "dotnet run", meet error:"Unhandled exception". #39397
  • [Discussion] Razor compiler no longer produces a Views assembly #31578
    Discussions
  • Inject a Blazor component instance into the app? #39560
  • Perf improvement: json #39558
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs #39542
  • asp.netcore cpu throttle in k8s cluster #29150
    Discussions
  • Performance of .Net 6 vs .Net Core 2.2 on big html pages #39237

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flakey HTTP/2 tests #39588
    area-runtime
  • Always build App.Ref and the targeting packs (subset) #39587
  • Sync shared code from runtime #39571
    area-runtime
  • Always build App.Ref and App.Ref.Internal (subset) #39570
  • Always build App.Ref and App.Ref.Internal #39569
  • Always build App.Ref and the targeting packs #39568
  • Remove separate build step in Helix jobs #39567
  • Automatically pack when building in CI builds #39566
  • !nits! Clean up App.Ref, App.Runtime slightly #39565
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4e9fe30` #39576
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `fc3ec49` to `a50a863` #39577
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add Quality parameter to BrowserFileExtensions.RequestImageFileAsync #32772
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove Interop build step #39553
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Push notification in MAUI #4173
  • [Bug] iOS FormattedText doesn't render all styles correctly #4172
  • Blazor Maui .Net 6 /Request Again Permission (Deny Mode) In Blazor Page #4170
  • [Android] App crashes when start from background #4169
  • [Windows] Crash loading dynamic XAML content #4168
  • [Windows] Wrong Grid columns and rows Auto sizing #4167
  • ListView WinUI Group Header renderers incorrect string for first group header #4166
  • [Windows] Wrong default DatePicker and TimePicker TextColor #4165
  • [Android] HeightRequest, WidthRequest, MinimumWidthRequest and MinimumHeightRequest are not respected by Contentview #4164
  • Visual Studio for Windows doesn't connect to mac #4163
  • Button Command not firing #4162

Closed

  • [Windows] Weird ListView behavior scrolling #4091
  • I'd love to take a stab at it #4161
  • Make ListView ViewHandler friendly #3448
  • Error APT2144 invalid file path dotnet_bot.svg #3900
  • [Bug] [Android] ClearButton initially not showing up #3379
  • [Windows] The draw method doesn't trigger when changing flow direction to the GraphicsView #4105
  • DatePicker popup is not showing the selected date #3756

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip some mappings when using formatted text #4174
  • Update IOSWebViewManager.cs #4158
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎, s/needs info ❓

Merged

  • ListView Handler for WinUI #3916
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] SwipeViewHandler #4064
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/SwipeView
  • TableView handler android #4104
  • Unify Windows shared source for BlazorWebView #4159
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Android] Listview handler via `Compatibility.ViewRenderer` #3817
  • Remove unused WebViewManagerCreated event and types #4160
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • SwipeViewHandler WinUI #4026
  • Invalidate GraphicsView if the FlowDirection changes #4133
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️

Updated

  • [Android] Fix Switch color issues #4134
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Button Padding #3575
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • IBorder #4035
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4130
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extensive SQL translation in where-statement with nullable types #27202
  • Error with HasConversion in EF.Core.Tools 6.0.1 #27201

Closed

  • Fully qualified attributes #27196
  • compare to database tables and dbcontext dbsets for Missing Table Creation #27195

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #26676 - EF Core 6 - IsTemporal adds an unnecessary migration when DefaultSchema is configured at the DbContext Level #27198
